name: Gray Ocean
description:
Every year the ocean H₂O becomes more and more an ocean of (С₂H₄)n with a mixture of other, no less dangerous plastics. Plastic is known to break down into microparticles and cause irreparable damage to the environment...

This is my final work in my «The Ocean’s Problems with Humans» series. This artwork is the message I want to get across to everyone.
